name: Verse World
description: Verse World is a successful VR company with long term clients such as Dubai Police, Toyota, Lexus, BYD or Lionel Messi. They also been building for the last four years with a team of 50+ full-time developers a digital world similar to Grand Theft Auto, accessible via desktop on the Epic Games Store or via Virtual Reality , which is powered by an immersive in-game economy centered around the Verse token.
